channel.title: Autistic Groups on Autism resources for newly diagnosed or self-identified Autistic people.
channel.description: Recent content in Autistic Groups on Autism resources for newly diagnosed or self-identified Autistic people.

item.title: Autastic
item.description: About Autastic: Autastic exists as a home for the uncounted legion of adults worldwide who learned, well into adulthood, that they are (or might be) autistic.

item.title: Sounds Autistic
item.description: About Sounds Autistic: The Sounds Autistic I'm In is a private Facebook group for autistic adults that are 18+ only.

item.title: Wrong Planet
item.description: About Wrong Planet: Wrong Planet is a web community designed for autistic individuals as well as parents and professionals of those with Autism, Aspergerâ€™s Syndrome, ADHD, PDDs, and other neurological differences.

item.title: Autistic Adults
item.description: About Autistic Adults: Autistic Adults is a Facebook group that is for autistic adults that would like help and support to deal with anxiety, depression, and other emotional support.

item.title: Meetup
item.description: About Meetup: Meetup does have some autistic support groups and it is worth doing a search for groups in your area to see if there is one near you.

item.title: Autism Forums
item.description: About Autism Forums: Autism Forums is a friendly forum to discuss Aspergers Syndrome, Autism, High Functioning Autism and related conditions.

item.title: ACEing Autism
item.description: About ACEing Autism: ACEing Autism is on a mission for children with autism to grow, develop and benefit from social connections and fitness through affordable tennis programming.
